head.title: Equity Offerings Planned for the Week

hedline.hl1: Equity Offerings Planned for the Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week.
Account4.com Inc., Newton, Mass., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Robinson-Humphrey Co.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week.
Account4.com Inc., Newton, Mass., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Robinson-Humphrey Co.
Airspan Networks Inc., Middlesex, England, an initial public offering of 5 million shares. CS First Boston.
Argonaut Technologies Inc., San Carlos, Calif., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. ING Barrings and SG Cowen.
ClearWave N.V., Amsterdam, an initial public offering of 10.6 million shares. Bear, Stearns and Solomon Smith Barney.
CoorsTek Inc., Golden, Colo., 2 million shares. CIBC Wood Gundy
Corio Inc., San Carlos, Calif., an initial public offering of 10 million shares. Goldman, Sachs and Merril Lynch.
Daum Communications Corp., Seoul, South Korea, 10 million shares. CS First Boston.
deCODE Genetics Inc., Reykjavic, Iceland, an initial public offering of 8 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter & Co.
Digital United Holdings Ltd., Taiwan, 10 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
DuPont Photomasks Inc., Round Rock, Tex., 3.2 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter & Co. and CS First Boston.
Embraer-Empresa Brasileira de Aeronautica S.A., Sau Paulo, Brazil, an initial public offering of 18.9 million shares. Merril Lynch and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter & Co.
eRoom System Technologies Inc., Las Vegas, Nev., an initial public offering of 1.8 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Evoke Communications Inc., Louisville, Colo., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Fresenius Medical Care A.G., Germany, 5 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Quanta Services Inc., Houston, 2.72 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter & Co.
SMTC Corp., Markham, Ontario, an initial public offering of 9.625 million shares. RBC Dominion Securities.
Support.com Inc., Redwood City, Calif., an initial public offering of 4.25 million shares. CS First Boston.
Talarian Corp., Los Altos, Calif., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Transgenomic Inc., Omaha, an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Chase H&Q.
Variagenics Inc., Cambridge Mass., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. CS First Boston.
Vascular Solutions Inc., Minneapolis, an initial public offering of 3 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
